headline: A Look At Hormel Foods (HRL) Valuation As New ESOP Share Offering Signals Potential Dilution
summary: Hormel Foods (HRL) has just filed a shelf registration to offer 21,951,785 shares of common stock, tied to an ESOP related transaction, with a total potential value of about US$540.2 million. See our latest analysis for Hormel Foods. The shelf registration arrives after a period of improving momentum in the share price, with a 30 day share price return of 9.8% and 90 day share price return of 13.9%. However, the 1 year total shareholder return of 10.1% and 5 year total shareholder return of...

headline: Reassessing Hormel Foods (HRL) After Mixed Returns And Conflicting Valuation Signals
summary: If you are wondering whether Hormel Foods' share price reflects its true worth today, this article will walk through the key numbers that matter for valuation. The stock last closed at US$25.09, with returns of 2.7% over the past week, 9.8% over the past month, 7.3% year to date and a 10.1% decline over the past year, alongside longer term 3 year and 5 year declines of 37.0% and 39.2% respectively. Recent coverage around Hormel Foods has focused on how investors are reassessing traditional...
